channel.title: How do I make custom NPCs?
channel.description: This seems very hard, but I want to make a custom npc. I am a beginner at server making, but I can understand a lot of things. Does anyone know how to?

item.title: How do I make custom NPCs?
item.description:
@14-08 wrote:

Download meta, make an NPC, comvert to a .dat file using Gzip then put to ur client model folder, compile, run server then add model "model name"

Then you need to add ints to one of the classes, (cant remember which one)

That class is called Class8.java. That is client-sided.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make custom NPCs?

item.title: How do I make custom NPCs?

@johno2 wrote:

[quote=“Scorpionsting, post:1, topic:288956”]This seems very hard, but I want to make a custom npc.
I am a beginner at server making, but I can understand a lot of things.
Does anyone know how to?[/quote]

Download meta, make an NPC, comvert to a .dat file using Gzip then put to ur client model folder, compile, run server then add model “model name”

Then you need to add ints to one of the classes, (cant remember which one)

Read full topic
